header.topics: Discussing dressing for a wedding as Mother of the Bride; decorations, bridesmaids; Game of Thrones; daughter-in-law-to-be - her job (local journalism) and bridegroom's job, involving commuting to London and teaching via Skype and YouTube; music at wedding receptions, choice of marquee, wedding food theme; villager's complaint during previous local wedding.
header.activity: Arranging family weddings and Game of Thrones
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling
